name: Doppelganger Tower
description:
Use your ability to split into two to solve puzzles and reach the top! Made in 49 hours for the UNCC Fall 2021 49er game jam.

Controls:

WASD to move main character and mini character 1

Arrows to move mini character 2

Space to split into two and recombine if standing together

F to pick up objects

R to reset the level if you get stuck (sorry)

The red mini can walk through green walls

Credits:

Programmer: Chris (me)

Artist: Franky

Music and Sound: Tyler

Concept art: Jaylon
